description: Calling all memelords: Decorate Breitbart's 'fabulous wall' and you could win a free Border Construction Co. t-shirt. | Entertainment
title: Decorate My #FabulousWall To Win a Signed, Limited Edition Breitbart Border Construction Co. T-Shirt
title_page: Decorate My #FabulousWall To Win a Signed, Limited Edition Breitbart Border Construction Co. T-Shirt | Breitbart
text:
Would you like to win a signed Breitbart Border Construction Co. t-shirt, as modelled by yours truly and the Queen of Conservative Media, Ann Coulter? Of course you would. Here’s how.
Take the image above and decorate it however you please. You could add lovely glittery T’s for Trump, you could add slogans, memes from 4chan… you can do whatever you want.
Tweet it with #FabulousWall and you could win a free shirt signed by this glamorous blonde model and have your work featured on Breitbart.com.
Currently the Breitbart Store only ships shirts to the United States — so, if you’re outside the US, this is your best shot at getting one of these limited edition beauties.
The Rules
